social.VSCO¶

class social.VSCO(username)[source]¶

Scrape the data of a VSCO user

username¶

str – User’s username

Examples

Download all data of @joe

>>> from cloudburst import social as cbs
>>> joe = cbs.VSCO("joe") # instantiate new VSCO object
>>> joe.download_all() # download all images and journal images
__init__(self, username)[source]¶

Constructor method

Parameters:username (str) – any VSCO user’s username

Methods

__init__(self, username) Constructor method
download_all(self) Download all available data for a user
download_images(self) Download all images for a given user
download_journal(self) Download all journal images for a given user
